english.segment1: Were like zombies. Like the walking dead. With Xs (excess) in our eyes. And music in our heads. Weve forgotten. Our first love. And made it pictures. Of crosses and doves
english.segment2: Remember when we were real. Back when we could feel?. Once we were in this. Now were of this. Jesus, turn these tables over
english.segment3: We all follow. But were standing still. Reciting dead words. With hopeless zeal. Were all preachers. With our mouths closed. Clothing messages. In sugar coats
english.segment4: Remember when we were real. Back when we could feel?. Once we were in this. Now were of this. Jesus, turn these tables over
english.segment5: I wanna hide beneath the pretty paint. I wanna be okay with everything. I wanna be transformed and stay the same. I wanna be dry in the rain
english.segment6: Remember when we were real. Back when we could feel?. Once we were in this. Now were of this. Jesus, turn these tables over
english.segment7: Running in this stupid circle. Running in the stupid circle. Our souvenirs wont be worth a single thing. And Truth will never be in
